abstract: In this week’s podcast: On the ground with the Neato XV-11 vacuum robot; Michel Marriott, sci-fi writer, on imagining future tech; a Microsoft Office game; and news.
snippet: In this week’s podcast: On the ground with the Neato XV-11 vacuum robot; Michel Marriott, sci-fi writer, on imagining future tech; a Microsoft Office game; and news.
lead_paragraph: In this week’s New York Times Tech Talk podcast we ask: How smart can a vacuum robot be? J.D. Biersdorfer and Sam Grobart, deputy editor of the Times Home section, get on the ground with the Neato XV-11.
